text: Jitia taikhan poila thaka duijon sipahi aru bahar te thaka duijon sipahi ke paar korise, taikhan loha laga ekta dorja usorte punchise juntu khuli kene taikhan sheher te jabo paribo; aru etu nijor pora khuli jaise. Titia taikhan ulaikene rasta nichete jaise, aru sorgodoth taike chari kene jai jaise.
